pages.text: A powerful amulet that can only be found in Witch Houses from treasure chests or from $(l:amethyst_imbuement:bestiary/sardonyx_elemental)Sardonyx Elementals$().
This amulet is found infused with the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/ensouled)Ensouled$() modifier, which randomly buffs Soul spells cast by the wearer.
